name: h3
description: The 2026 Rawlings Icon Drop 8 USSSA Baseball Bat is crafted for players seeking a perfect balance of power and control. Its 2-piece composite construction features a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter, making it ideal for both contact and power hitters. With an eye-catching teal colorway and innovative In/Tense Carbon Composite, this bat optimizes barrel performance and enhances the trampoline effect. Zero Loss Energy Technology minimizes drag and hand vibration, while Tuned Balanced Performance adjusts to each batter's unique swing. Equipped with a RevGrip, it ensures superior tack and cushioning for a confident grip. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
